decisions.description: Decision element to check dates entered are valid.

decisions.label: Check Dates Are Valid

decisions.description: Decision element to check dates entered are valid.
decisions.name: Check_Dates_Are_Valid_Inspection
decisions.label: Check Dates Are Valid

rules.name: Dates_Valid_Inspection
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2) AND (3 OR 4) AND (5 OR 6) AND (7 OR 8)
rules.label: Dates Valid

decisions.description: Decision element to check dates entered are valid.
decisions.name: Check_Dates_Are_Valid_Inventory
decisions.label: Check Dates Are Valid

rules.name: Calibration_Inspection_Authorised
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND (4 OR 5 OR 6)) OR (2 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6))
rules.label: Calibration/Inspection Authorised

fields.fieldText: Input or Scan Energy Networks ID:

screens.label: Choose Inspection Type

fields.fieldText: Inspection Type

screens.name: Capture_User_Location_Screen
screens.label: Choose User/Location

fields.name: User_Location_Picklist
fields.fieldText: User/Location

fields.name: UnserviceableDisplayTextInventoryLostStolen
fields.fieldText:
You marked an item as lost/stolen, the status will be updated to show this in due course.


If you are unable to do so, please ask a member of the Compliance Team to process end of life for this equipment if neccessary.

fields.name: UnserviceableDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
You marked an item as unserviceable, the status will be updated to show this in due course.


If you are unable to do so, please ask a member of the Compliance Team to process end of life for this equipment.

fields.name: UnserviceableDisplayTextInventory
fields.fieldText:
You marked an item as unserviceable, the status will be updated to show this in due course.


If you are unable to do so, please ask a member of the Compliance Team to process end of life for this equipment.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to the user that they don't have the relevant permissions to run a calibration in the system.
screens.name: Failed_Calibration_Permission_Set_Check_Screen_Multi
screens.label: Failed Permission Check

fields.name: MissingCalibrationPermissionAssignmentTextMulti
fields.fieldText:
You are not authorised to run a calibration.


If you should have authorisation, please speak with your team leader/manager to request access.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to the user that they don't have the relevant permissions to run an inspection in the system.
screens.name: Failed_Inspection_Permission_Set_Check_Screen_Multi
screens.label: Failed Permission Check

fields.name: MissingInspectionPermissionAssignmentTextMulti
fields.fieldText:
You are not authorised to run an inspection.


If you should have authorisation, please speak with your team leader/manager to request access.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to the user that they don't have the relevant permissions to run an inventory check in the system.
screens.name: Failed_Inventory_Check_Permission_Set_Check_Screen
screens.label: Failed Permission Check

fields.name: MissingInventoryCheckPermissionAssignmentText
fields.fieldText:
You are not authorised to run an inventory check.


If you should have authorisation, please speak with your team leader/manager to request access.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to the user that they don't have the relevant permissions to run a store inventory check in the system.
screens.name: Failed_Permission_Check_Store_Inventory_Check
screens.label: Failed Permission Check

fields.name: MissingStoreInventoryCheckPermissionAssignmentText
fields.fieldText:
You are not authorised to run an inventory check on a Compliance Store.


If you should have authorisation, please speak with your team leader/manager to request access.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to the user that they don't have the relevant permissions to run an inspection in the system.
screens.name: Failed_Permission_Set_Check_Screen
screens.label: Failed Permission Check

fields.name: NotAuthorisedDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
You are not authorised to run this process.


If you should have authorisation, please speak with your team leader/manager to request access.

fields.name: Pass_Fail_Ticked_Incorrect_Display_Text
fields.fieldText: You must choose whether you are passing or failing the equipment. Press next to update the record.

screens.description: Screen for user to log inventory check inspections.
screens.name: Initial_Inventory_Check_Screen
screens.label: Log Inventory Check

fields.name: Inspected_By
fields.fieldText:
Inspected By: {!UserDetails.Name}


Energy Networks ID: {!loopforFoundInventoryCheckItems.SPEN_Energy_Networks_ID__c}

Category: {!loopforFoundInventoryCheckItems.SPEN_Category__c}

Description: {!loopforFoundInventoryCheckItems.SPEN_Item_Description__c}


Pass or Fail?

fields.name: Pass_Inventory_Check
fields.fieldText: Pass

fields.name: Fail_Inventory_Check
fields.fieldText: Fail

screens.description: Screen to confirm to User that Inspection has now been logged.
screens.name: Inspection_Confirmation
screens.label: Inspection Confirmation

fields.name: InspectionCompleteDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Thanks for logging the Inspection. This has now been added to the system.

screens.description: Screen for user to log updates to safety check dates on the serialised product object.
screens.name: Inspection_Date_Update_Screen
screens.label: Date Update

fields.name: DateChangeDisplayText_Inspection
fields.fieldText: Please enter dates you wish to change, this will be updated for you on the equipment:

fields.name: New_Date_Do_Not_Use_After_Inspection
fields.fieldText: New Date (Do Not Use After)

fields.name: New_Date_Insurance_Inspection_Due_Inspection
fields.fieldText: New Date (Insurance Inspection Due)

fields.name: New_Date_Service_Due_Inspection
fields.fieldText: New Date (Service Due)

fields.name: New_Date_Calibration_Due_Inspection
fields.fieldText: New Date (Calibration Due)

fields.name: External_Inspection_By_Entry_Text_Inspection
fields.fieldText: External Inspection By (Enter if required)

fields.name: Result_Inspection
fields.fieldText: Result

fields.name: Next_Action_Inspection
fields.fieldText: Next Action

fields.name: Inspection_Comments
fields.fieldText: Comments

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user dates entered on previous screen are invalid.
screens.name: Invalid_Dates_Inspection
screens.label: Invalid Dates

fields.name: InvalidDatesDisplayTextInspection
fields.fieldText: You have entered a date which is earlier than today. Please press next to change the dates and continue with the inspection.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user dates entered on previous screen are invalid.
screens.name: Invalid_Dates_Inventory
screens.label: Invalid Dates

fields.name: InvalidDatesDisplayTextInventory
fields.fieldText: You have entered a date which is earlier than today. Please press next to change the dates and continue with the inventory check.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user dates entered on previous screen are invalid.
screens.name: Invalid_Dates_Screen_Calibration
screens.label: Invalid Dates

fields.name: InvalidDatesDisplayTextCalibration
fields.fieldText: You have entered a date which is earlier than today. Please press next to change the dates and continue with the calibration.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to the user that the ENID entered is not valid/doesn't match a Serialised Product record.
screens.name: Invalid_ENID_Screen
screens.label: Invalid Energy Networks ID

fields.name: InvalidENIDDisplayText
fields.fieldText: The chosen Energy Networks ID is not valid. Please input or scan an ID that matches a relevant item.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to the user that the location entered is not valid as there are no inventory items in the current location.
screens.name: Invalid_Inventory_Screen
screens.label: Invalid Inventory Check Request

fields.name: InvalidLocationInventoryDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
No inventory has been found, an inventory check cannot be processed at this time.


Location/User: {!chosenLocationName}

screens.description: Screen to confirm to User that Inventory Check has now been logged.
screens.name: Inventory_Check_Confirmation
screens.label: Inventory Check Confirmation

fields.name: InventoryCheckCompleteDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Thanks for logging the Inventory Check. This has now been added to the system.

screens.description: Screen for user to log updates to safety check dates on the serialised product object.
screens.name: Inventory_Check_Date_Update_Screen
screens.label: Date Update

fields.name: Inventory_Check_DateChangeDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Please enter dates you wish to change for passed equipment, this will be updated for you:

fields.name: New_Date_Do_Not_Use_After_Inventory
fields.fieldText: New Date (Do Not Use After)

fields.name: New_Date_Service_Due_Inventory
fields.fieldText: New Date (Service Due)

screens.description: Screen for user to log failed inventory check inspections.
screens.name: Inventory_Check_Failed_Screen
screens.label: Log Failed Inventory Check

fields.name: Not_Present_Inventory_Check
fields.fieldText: Not Present Today

fields.name: Next_Action_Inventory_Check
fields.fieldText: Result

fields.name: Failed_Inventory_Comments
fields.fieldText: Comments

screens.description: Screen to confirm the Compliance Stores record type for Location is missing from the system.
screens.name: Missing_Location_Record_Type_Screen
screens.label: Missing System Record Type

fields.name: MissingLocationRecordTypeDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
An inspection cannot be logged at this time. Please advise the system administrator of the below issue.


The below Record Type is missing from the Location object:


  • Compliance Stores

screens.description: Screen to confirm the Compliance Stores record type for Product Transfers is missing from the system.
screens.name: Missing_Product_Transfer_Record_Type_Screen
screens.label: Missing System Record Type

fields.name: MissingProductTransferRecordTypeDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
An inspection cannot be logged at this time. Please advise the system administrator of the below issue.


The below Record Type is missing from the Product Transfer object:


  • Compliance Stores

screens.description: Screen to confirm the Compliance Stores record type for Product Transfers is missing from the system.
screens.name: Missing_Product_Transfer_Record_Type_Screen_Inspection
screens.label: Missing System Record Type

fields.name: MissingProductTransferRecordTypeDisplayText_Inspection
fields.fieldText:
An inspection cannot be logged at this time. Please advise the system administrator of the below issue.


The below Record Type is missing from the Product Transfer object:


  • Compliance Stores

screens.description: Screen to confirm the Compliance Stores record type for Serialised Products is missing from the system.
screens.name: Missing_Serialised_Product_Record_Type_Screen
screens.label: Missing System Record Type

fields.name: MissingSerialisedProductRecordTypeDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
An inspection cannot be logged at this time. Please advise the system administrator of the below issue.


The below Record Type is missing from the Serialised Product object:


  • Compliance Stores

screens.description: Screen to advise users they must fill out the next action if they are failing the calibration.
screens.name: Next_Action_Incorrect_Screen_Calibration
screens.label: Next Action - Retry

fields.name: Next_Action_Incorrect_Display_Text
fields.fieldText: If you are failing the calibration, a next action must be populated. Press next to correct the record.

screens.description: Screen to advise users they must fill out the next action if they are failing the inspection.
screens.name: Next_Action_Incorrect_Screen_Inspection
screens.label: Next Action - Retry

fields.name: Next_Action_Incorrect_Display_Text_Inspection
fields.fieldText: If you are failing the inspection, a next action must be populated. Press next to correct the inspection record.

screens.description: Screen to advise users they must fill out the next action if they are failing the inventory item.
screens.name: Next_Action_Missing_Screen
screens.label: Next Action - Retry

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Next_Action_Incorrect_Display_Text_Inspection
fields.fieldText: If you are failing the equipment, the result must be populated. Press next to correct the inventory record.

screens.description: Screen for user to search user/location
screens.name: Search_User_Location_Screen
screens.label: Search User/Location

fields.name: Search_User_Location_text
fields.fieldText: Search User/Location

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user that there are items chosen from the multiset which are not available for a calibration inspection.
screens.name: Unavailable_Calibration
screens.label: Calibration Unavailable

fields.name: UnavailableDisplayTextCalibration
fields.fieldText: There are active items in the set chosen for calibration which are showing as in the store, please speak to a member of the compliance team to fix then attempt again.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user that the scanned/entered item is not available for an inspection.
screens.name: Unavailable_Inspection
screens.label: Inspection Unavailable

fields.name: UnavailableDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
The chosen Energy Networks ID is not valid. Please input or scan the ID for an item that is available for an inspection. See below for more information:


Location: {!recordId.SPEN_Location_Name__c}

Status: {!recordId.SPEN_Item_Status__c}
